appDesc.message: This Extension will automatically redirect you to the corresponding AmazonSmile page from Amazon.com.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

appAuthor.message: WebDevNerdStuff & Bunnies... lots and lots of bunnies!

nav__about.description: Navigation Text for: About Amazon Smile Redirect

about__intro.message: Help your favorite non-profit by purchasing your Amazon items through AmazonSmile.

about__overviewParagraph.message: This Extension will automatically redirect you to the corresponding AmazonSmile page, so you will never need to remember to go to AmazonSmile first. In order for your non-profit to benefit from your purchase, you must complete your purchase through AmazonSmile.

about__legalInformationParagraph.message: AmazonSmile and the AmazonSmile logo are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates. The extension was not created or endorsed by Amazon.

about__allRightsReserved.description: About page copyright All Rights Reserved
